body_html:
This works, thanks!

Then the following error occurred:

RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (48) : no kernel image is available for execution on the device...

So just the Cuda 8 version of Pytorch was tried, however, tensorflow-gpu (installed via conda) did not let me install it. The solution was to conda uninstall tensorflow-gpu, then I could install Pytorch (with Cuda 8). Thanks
body_text:
This works, thanks!
Then the following error occurred:
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (48) : no kernel image is available for execution on the device...
So just the Cuda 8 version of Pytorch was tried, however, tensorflow-gpu (installed via conda) did not let me install it. The solution was to  conda uninstall tensorflow-gpu, then I could install Pytorch (with Cuda 8). Thanks
body:
This works, thanks!

Then the following error occurred:

`RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (48) : no kernel image is available for execution on the device...`

So just the Cuda 8 version of Pytorch was tried, however, tensorflow-gpu (installed via conda) did not let me install it. The solution was to  `conda uninstall tensorflow-gpu`, then I could install Pytorch (with Cuda 8). Thanks
